evidence.claim: The Chisu Program utilizes AWS services for cloud computing and data management.
Chisu Program ensures HIPAA compliance in their data handling processes.
The organization leverages FHIR standards for healthcare data integration.
Chisu employs API gateways for seamless integration of their healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes HIPAA X12 transactions and health tech, supporting API-driven workflows.
